articles.title: Bankruptcies are exploding across the economy, hitting small businesses and households. Few industries are immune.
articles.mainIdea: Bankruptcies are exploding across the economy, hitting small businesses and households. Few industries are immune.
articles.summary: Business Insider: Bankruptcies are exploding across the economy, hitting small businesses and households. Few industries are immune.. Bankruptcies are suddenly everywhere, from billion-dollar giants to small businesses to individuals. Experts are stumped at the breadth of industries.

articles.title: Scott Galloway says the key to landing jobs is be as social as possible: ‘70% of the time, the person they pick is someone with an internal advocate’
articles.mainIdea: Scott Galloway says the key to landing jobs is be as social as possible: ‘70% of the time, the person they pick is someone with an internal advocate’
articles.summary: Fortune: Scott Galloway says the key to landing jobs is be as social as possible: ‘70% of the time, the person they pick is someone with an internal advocate’. “You want to be placed in rooms of opportunities where you’re not physically there,” the NYU Stern School of Business professor said.

articles.title: Investing in Corporate Bonds? One of These ETFs Holds Up Better Long-Term.
articles.mainIdea: Investing in Corporate Bonds? One of These ETFs Holds Up Better Long-Term.
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Investing in Corporate Bonds? One of These ETFs Holds Up Better Long-Term.. Expense-conscious investors face a tradeoff between higher yield and long-term resilience when choosing between these two bond ETFs.
